title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Beat eggs with Parmesan in a bowl.
Drain pasta and toss with pancetta and egg mixture.
Serve immediately with extra Parmesan and pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spice mix for at least 1 hour.
Grill or fry chicken until cooked.
Heat tomato puree in a pan, add cream and salt.
Stir in chicken pieces and simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or naan bread.
